p.s: Realistic artworks are works of art that looks cool .
This article provides guidance on how to make any artwork more realistic .

item.s: Pick the artwork you want to make more realistic .
For example , an image of a snake .
This will be your " base " artwork .
It could take some time to get it perfect if you 're drawing it from scratch .
Try using shapes to get the base perfect .
Use a circle for the head and eyes ( Half circle for Evil eyes , oval for the body , etc. )
Make sure to add two lines to get the face right .
Create some texture in your art .
For a lion , make it look furry , A snake or fish will be scaly , a bird will be feathery .
Some animals or things can have more than one texture .
Try many different kinds of textures .
Add some shading .
Think of where the light would be .
If it 's coming from behind , the front would be darker then behind .
If it 's in front , the back would be a bit darker then the front .
Try to think of it as a shadow .
Include some interesting effects to the art .
Like glowing eyes , a slight glow , magic or flames , for example .
This will add in some details to the drawing .
Plus , it would look cool and neat .
For most effects , you can use an oil brush , a big paintbrush or a water brush .
This will add some realistic effects to the artwork .
If you are creating an artwork using a computer programme , these brushes may be tools or options in the programme .
This can also apply to water to make it look real .
Like a reflection .
Take a look at the art work .
If it looks real , It 's done . ( Unless you want to add backgrounds )
Add in a background ( optional ) .
This will make the artwork more enjoyable and add a bit of scenery .
Make sure to add some depth to the artwork ( Optional ) .
This can be things like small object in the back , big objects in front , this kind of idea .
Submit the artwork online .
You can use Devintart or any online art sites for it .
Others can see it if you decide to do so .
Just make sure to add your signature onto it to prevent art theft .
Take some time .
Huge artworks are n't usually finished within a day .
It can take weeks or even months to get it done .
Always save your work .
You do n't want to start all over again from scratch , do you ?
You can always watch other artists draw artwork .
This can help you make a good art work later on .
If doing it in real life , make sure to let the painting dry before sending it .
Make sure to get the shapes right or it 'll look weird and cartoony .
Do n't steal other peoples work .
Nobody likes art theft .
Always remember to save or you could lose all the hard work on your art .
If you found out someone stole your work , report it .

Put in a little bit of elements to make it real .
